31 class AVRO_DECL ResolvingReader : private boost::noncopyable {
32 
33 public:
34  ResolvingReader(const ResolverSchema &schema, const InputBuffer &in) : reader_(in),
35  schema_(schema) {}
36 
37  template<typename T>
38  void parse(T &object) {
39  schema_.parse(reader_, reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>(&object));
40  }
41 
42 private:
43  Reader reader_;
44  ResolverSchema schema_;
45 };
